import sys


def d(n):
    res = 0
    for c in str(n):
        c = int(c)
        if c & 1:
            res += c
        else:
            res += c * 2
        res %= 10
    return res


def srange(a, b):
    i = a
    res = 0
    while i < b:
        res += d(i)
        i += 1
    return res


n = int(sys.stdin.readline().strip())
for _ in range(n):
    a, b = sys.stdin.readline().strip().split()
    a = int(a)
    b = int(b)
    edge1 = a + ((-a) % 10)
    edge2 = b - (b % 10)
    if a <= edge1 < edge2 <= b:
        res = srange(a, edge1)
        res += ((edge2 - edge1) / 10) * 45
        res += srange(edge2, b + 1)
        print res
    else:
        print srange(a, b + 1)

    #mlen = max(len(a), len(b))
    #a = a.rjust(mlen, "0")
    #b = b.rjust(mlen, "0")
    #s = 0
